Do you want to lead the fight against misinformation across Africa?

:woman_technologist: We're looking for a Managing Editor to join our @PesaCheck team.

:globe_showing_Europe-Africa: East Africa

:writing_hand_selector: Apply here by 25 October: https://t.co/yrSOBxxd0W https://t.co/PRHKPRIxPz
